importantArticles.headline: Amcor (NYSE: AMCR) (ASX:AMC), a global leader in developing and producing responsible packaging solutions, announced the extension of the application period for a new challenge under its Amcor Lift-Off initiative, the Amcor Lift-Off Sprints. The challenge aims to support innovative companies that provide new, innovative compostable or recyclable barrier coatings solutions for paper and other compostable substrates.
importantArticles.title: Amcor Lift-Off initiative extends deadline for compostable or recyclable barrier coating solution challenge
